verses.name: Jeremiah 1:12
verses.text: Then said the Lord unto me, Thou hast well seen: for I will hasten my word to perform it.

verses.name: Jeremiah 1:13
verses.text: And the word of the Lord came unto me the second time, saying, What seest thou? And I said, I see a seething pot; and the face thereof is toward the north.

verses.name: Jeremiah 1:14
verses.text: Then the Lord said unto me, Out of the north an evil shall break forth upon all the inhabitants of the land.
